Package com.cmart.PageServlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnswerQuestionServlet
    This servlet is for users answering a question
    AskQuestionServlet
    This servlet allows user to ask questions about an item
    BidHistoryServlet
    This servlet displays the bid history of an item
    BrowseCategoryServlet
    This page allows the user to browse items

    This page allows the user to browse items

    This page allows the user to browse items

    BrowseVideosServlet

    This servlet allows a user to buy an item
    ChangePrefetchValueServlet
    This servlet changes the prefetch image value
    CommentItemServlet
    This servlet is used to allow user to leave comment
    ConfirmBidServlet
    This servlet confirms that the user's bid was entered
    ConfirmBuyServlet
    This servlet confirms that the user bought an item
    ConfirmCommentServlet
    This servlet confirms that a comment was entered
    ConfirmFriendRequestServlet
    This servlet confirms that the user's friend request was entered
    ConfirmMessageServlet
    This servlet confirms that the user's friend request was entered
    ConfirmSellItemServlet
    This servlet confirms that the user's bid was entered

    This servlet is a blank example

    This servlet is a blank example
    FaultServlet  
    GetBulkDataServlet
    This page gets bulk data from the database so that the client can have all of a table

    This page allows the user to get wall post

    This servlet gets use details for the client generator

    This page allows the user to get wall post
    HomeServlet
    This servlet is the home page servlet
    LoginServlet
    This servlet is the user login servlet
    LogoutServlet
    This servlet logs out a user
    MoveOldItemsServlet
    This servlet moves expired items to the 'old' tables
    MyAccountServlet
    This servlet is the user account
    ReadFriendRequestServlet
    This page allows the user to read FriendRequest
    ReadMessageServlet
    This page allows the user to read message
    RegisterUserServlet
    This servlet registers a new user in the database
    SearchServlet
    This page allows the user to search for items
    SellItemImagesServlet
    This servlet uploads the images for an item if the user wants to add any
    SellItemServlet
    This servlet uploads images for an item
    SendFriendRequestServlet
    This servlet allows a user to send a FriendRequest
    SendMessageServlet
    This servlet allows a user to send a FriendRequest
    StatisticsServlet
    This servlet displays the other pages statistics
    TestDBServlet
    This servlet tests the database for correct functionality
